column4: Hello, im having a problem installing Ubuntu 10.10 it says there was an unrecoverable errorand the installer needs to restart, when i give it the ok it reboots my computer and then i choose ubuntu and itrepeats the install which in turn repeats the error, can someone help me?
did you check the disk for errors before install
your disk or iso was corrupted re-download it and checksum that one.
which site are you getting it from alot of people say getting it via torrents is a better
